alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and central Volusia Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over DeLand Airport, or near DeLand, moving northeast at 35 mph. Additional stronger storms are developing across northeast Lake and Volusia counties. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Ormond Beach and DeLand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County
